summary: the prevalence of CAM use was 69.9%; the most prominent types of CAM were those of a religious nature, such as supplication (95.4%), Quran recitation (88.1%), consuming Zamzam water (84.3%), and water upon which the Quran has been read (63.3%). electronic supplementary material available to authorized users. previously developed questionnaire was modified to include patients with hematological malignancies and those undergoing hematopoietic stem cell transplantation.
